Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The system shall be able to display a printable summary for individual cohorts which will include the students enlisted the Program of study sequence of classes cohort progress through the program and timeline of completion.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The product shall display each type of ship in a grid using an image of the specific type of ship.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category:

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The product must be able to interface with various database management systems. The product shall communicate successfully with the database management system on 100% of all transactions.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category:

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'Total lead cycle time must be completed in 5 minutes for 90% of lead volume between the business hours of 8AM CST to 8PM CST; then 3 minutes for 99% of lead volume during off business hours.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.

Now, classify the following given requirement: The interface shall have a simple look. In the interface and usability survey 90% of beta testers must report that the interface is adequately simple.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. Now, classify the following given requirement: 'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add new classes to a sequence of classes'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The product shall update existing conference rooms.'

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The user shall easily locate instructions while using the product. User help can be found within 90% of the system.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'If projected the data must be readable. On a 10x10 projection screen 90% of viewers must be able to read Event / Activity data from a viewing distance of 30'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'Only authorized personnel can access customer records in the database.': Security

'Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members shall have the ability to modify information relating to cohorts including cohort identifier program of study preferred sequence of classes and quarters that a cohort will be taking specific classes.': Functional

Now, classify the following given requirement: The product shall ensure that only supervisors can advertise empty time slots.The product must ensure that supervisors are allowed to access advertise empty time slots.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'All movies shall be streamed on demand at any time of the day.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The system shall display Events or Activities.'

Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. Now, classify the following given requirement: 'When the offensive player takes a shot the product shall simulate the sound of a ship at sea.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The system shall offer the ability to pause and resume the refresh of data.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category:

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The owner shall have free access to all of the streaming movies.'

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The product must be highly configurable for use with various database management systems for the end users. 80% of end users are able to integrate new database management systems with the product without changing the product’s software code.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'The Disputes System must provide a confirmation to the user upon the creation of a chargeback request. The confirmation must contain the following information; the dispute case number the type of chargeback requested (pending or immediate) and the date that the merchant response is due.': Functional
'The Disputes System will provide the user the ability to create or initiate a ticket retrieval request. As part of ticket retrieval creation process the system must prompt the user to enter all the required information to create the ticket retrieval request. The ticket retrieval request is a document that is sent to merchant inquiring the validity of a transaction.': Functional
'The Disputes System must allow the users to select disputable transactions (based on the age of the transaction) from a user interface and initiate a dispute (ticket retrieval request or chargeback notification) on the selected transaction.': Functional
'The Disputes System must allow the user to create three unique types of ticket retrieval requests. The three types of ticket retrieval requests are (1) Request for original receipt (2) Request for a copy of the receipt or (3) Request for a portfolio. A portfolio consists of documentation that would provide proof of a purchase such as the documentation that is received from a car rental agency that is more than a sales receipt.': Functional
'The Disputes System must provide Search functionality. The search method must include the ability to search by (1) the dispute case number (2) the merchant account number (3) the cardmember account number and (4) the issuer number. In addition to the above criteria the search functionality must further allow the user to limit the results of the search by a date range the type of dispute (ticket retrieval request or chargeback notification) the case status (open closed or all) and the dispute reason code.': Functional
'The Disputes System must provide a confirmation to the user upon the creation of ticket retrieval request that contains the following information; the dispute case number the type of retrieval requested (copy original or portfolio) and the date that the merchant response is due.': Functional
'The Disputes System must provide the user the ability to initiate a single dispute case on multiple transactions that belong to a single merchant.': Functional

The system must prompt the user to enter the required information to initiate a chargeback request. The chargeback request results in a printed chargeback notification that is sent to merchant indicating that their account will be charged back if no proof is provided that the disputed transaction is valid.'

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The product shall respond fast to keep up-to-date data in the display.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category:

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The user shall search for the preferred repair facility using vehicle vehicle location and radius in miles'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category:

'The Dispute System shall provide the users with the ability to follow up on a dispute case via follow-up actions. The list of available follow up actions for a given dispute case must be filtered by the status of the case and the access level of the user.': Functional

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The Disputes System must be accessible by both internal and external users.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The search radius shall be between 1 and 30 miles'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The product shall provide Error Tracking Services.The product shall help the System Administrators and DBAs to resolve transaction errors 99% of the time.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.

'The Disputes System will provide the user the ability to create or initiate a ticket retrieval request. As part of ticket retrieval creation process the system must prompt the user to enter all the required information to create the ticket retrieval request. The ticket retrieval request is a document that is sent to merchant inquiring the validity of a transaction.': Functional

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'For each shot the product shall examine the defensive grid of the defensive player to determine whether the shot was a hit or miss.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The current repair facility ratings shall be displayed to the user.'

The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The website should appeal to all Africans not only Nigerians.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The Disputes application shall support 350 concurrent users without any degradation of performance in the application.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The system will notify affected parties when changes occur affecting classes including but not limited to class cancellations class section detail changes and changes to class offerings for a given quarter.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'Any disputes cases that have been closed for over 6 months must be purged from the online disputes database.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The system shall be able to display a printable summary for individual clinical sites which will include information on labs being held at that site for the given quarter (Clinical site general information on labs held at that location dates and times of all labs held there).'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category:

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'System shall let existing customers log into the website with their email address and password in under 5 seconds.'

Now, classify the following given requirement: '100% of merchant services representatives shall be able to successfully perform a follow up action on a dispute case on the first encounter after completing the training course.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members shall have the ability to modify information relating to a Clinical Site including the clinical site name site contact person contact information and address.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The system shall be available for use between the hours of 8am and 6pm.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'Only authorized personnel can access customer records in the database.': Security
'Customer shall be able to check the status of their prepaid card by entering in the PIN number in under 5 seconds.': Performance
'All credit card information will be encrypted in the database.': Security

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'All registered customer information shall be stored and maintained in the database even after the customer cancels their account.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'Product formula ingredients shall allow defining substitutionary ingredients.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The System shall be able to automatically backup business data and restore them on demand.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'All additions of new users and modifications to user’s access shall be recorded on the User Report.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category:

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'All streaming movie sales will be logged in the database and accessible by the administrator.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.

'System shall let Izogn Manager access sales and usage statistics in under 2 minutes.': Performance

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'Every user of the system shall be authenticated and authorized.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'All of the users shall be able to use the system after one day of training.': Usability
'The interface shall be easy to use. 90% of users should be able to successfully use the system to generate a report on their first use. The interface should adhere to IBM usability standards.': Usability

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'A user shall be able to use the system without instruction after a short amount of time. After one use a user should understand and remember 90% of the system usage and navigation.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.

Now, classify the following given requirement: On a 56k connection the system response time for all operations must be no more than 6 seconds 90% of the time.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a new cohort to the system identified by start month and year.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'System shall let administrator de-activate a customer account in under 1 minute. Customer will no longer be able to access the website.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category:
